title: A star-studded start list: 10 riders to watch in the women’s ‘super worlds’ road race
content:
The likes of Demi Vollering and Lotte Kopecky are the five-star favorites but there are plenty more stars looking to grasp the rainbow this Sunday.

Read the full article at A star-studded start list: 10 riders to watch in the women’s ‘super worlds’ road race on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
